title: Warburg Pincus frontrunner to buy Shriram Housing Finance
description: Bain Capital is other key contender; binding bids submitted last week. Shriram Housing offers an opportunity for a PE player to benefit from the sharp growth expected in India's affordable housing space, which has gained significant momentum following the post-Covid shift in favour of home ownership
